sentences.en: ...a list of the underhanded ways in which their influence operates in the United States.
sentences.cn: …他们的势力在美国运作的一系列不正当手段。

sentences.en: But in softball, the pitcher must throw the ball underhanded.
sentences.cn: 但垒球的投手必须使用下手投球.

sentences.en: I have laid the biddy off for her underhanded performance.
sentences.cn: 我辞退了女佣,因为她手脚不老实.

sentences.en: I have laid the nanny off for her underhanded performance.
sentences.cn: 我辞退了保姆,因为她手脚不老实.

sentences.en: Man, talk about an underhanded way to deliver a subpoena!
sentences.cn: 嗨, 先生,用这种秘密方式给你送达传票.

sentences.en: The store is underhanded in busy season.
sentences.cn: 该商店在旺季期间缺少人手.

sentences.en: The store is underhanded in the Christmas season.
sentences.cn: 该商店在圣诞节期间缺少人手.

trans.tran_cn: <英>秘密的，狡诈的，偷偷摸摸的，人手不足的
trans.tran_en: If an action is underhand or if it is done in an underhand way, it is done secretly and dishonestly
